name: Michael Peluso
what_you_do: Michael Peluso is a lifetime entrepreneur and Health Practitioner. He is the Founder of True Living, Partner in two concrete companies, and CEO of Joinocity, a marketing and sales technology platform.
who_you_serve: Michael serves as a keynote speaker and a powerful advocate for mindset and lifestyle habit systems that results in increased business growth and life satisfaction. His coaching and consulting program has revitalized organizations in every industry and touched the lives of executives around the world.
social_proof: Michael has 20+ advanced certifications, has impacted thousands of lives, and has coached hundreds of businesses.
signature_programs: Elite Finance, Monetize Your Influence, Raising Capital Presentation and Communication, Leadership Coaching, Life Coaching, Communication Mastery
business_focus: Business and Lifestyle Development that helps successful leaders feel happy, healthy and free while making more money in less time.
